703140f-a.text:
Bayard Street, east from Lorimer Street. At the left when completed, will be Mc Carren Park.
September 10, 1935
P. L. Sperr.
703140f-a.folder: Bayard Street & Lorimer Street, Brooklyn, NY

705492f-a.text:
(1)
Lorimer Street, east side, north from Bayard Street, to Driggs Ave. Also seen is Driggs Ave., north side, east from Lorimer Street. At the
right is a part of Mc Carren Park.
September 10, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, a more extensive view, showing Bayard Street in the foreground.
September 10, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
705492f-a.folder: Lorimer Street & Bayard Street, Brooklyn, NY
